title: Does Hunter Biden’s Laptop Prove Biden Is Compromised? | Guests: Riley Moore & Michael Malice | 3/18/22
description:
Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the latest in the Biden administration's incompetency and Hunter Biden’s laptop. West Virginia state Treasurer Riley Moore joins to discuss the recent Virginia bill passed that bans financial institutions from dealing with the government if they are boycotting the fossil fuel industry. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss George Soros and the radicalization of the Left. Author Michael Malice joins to discuss the infamous Hunter Biden laptop and the media’s inexcusable cover-up of it. Glenn and Stu discuss some of the top stories of the week, including the latest on Ukraine. Glenn discusses the current oil crisis and how the Biden administration is actively crippling the fuel industry at every angle.
